title: Reiketsu Ryuu Sumerahi Heika No ~ Unmei No Ban ~ Rashii Desu Ga, Koukyuu Ni Hiki Komorou To Omoimasu
alternative_title: Reiketsu Ryuuou Heika no "Unmei no Tsugai" rashii Desu ga, Koukyuu ni Hikikomorou to Omoimasu ; 冷血竜皇陛下の「運命の番」らしいですが、後宮に引きこもろうと思います ～幼竜を愛でるのに忙しいので皇后争いはご勝手にどうぞ～ ; It seems I am the "fated mate" of the cold-blooded Dragon Emperor, but I plan to stay secluded in the harem ～I am busy doting on the young dragons, so please proceed with the empress competition as you wish～ ; 冷血竜皇陛下の「運命の番」らしいですが、後宮に引きこもろうと思います ～幼竜を愛でるのに忙しいので皇后争いはご勝手にどうぞ～
status: Reiketsu Ryuuou Heika no "Unmei no Tsugai" rashii Desu ga, Koukyuu ni Hikikomorou to Omoimasu ; 冷血竜皇陛下の「運命の番」らしいですが、後宮に引きこもろうと思います ～幼竜を愛でるのに忙しいので皇后争いはご勝手にどうぞ～ ; It seems I am the "fated mate" of the cold-blooded Dragon Emperor, but I plan to stay secluded in the harem ～I am busy doting on the young dragons, so please proceed with the empress competition as you wish～ ; 冷血竜皇陛下の「運命の番」らしいですが、後宮に引きこもろうと思います ～幼竜を愛でるのに忙しいので皇后争いはご勝手にどうぞ～
description:
Description :
        Ephinia is an elven princess who has just been granted an audience with the dragon clan emperor and the moment the two met, they discovered that she is the emperor's fated mate. She was shocked by this but when she heard the emperor's heartless words, saying, "It's regrettable that someone so childlike is my mate"...

Fine then! I don't desire your passionate love!

Ephinia later became close with a small dragon and is now fully enjoying her life in the emperor's harem however, it seems that there's a secret to this particular dragon...
